publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1145.1 Miss Annabel Goldie: The Creative Economy—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1145) in the name of Henry McLeish, leave out from "the emphasis" to end and insert "with concern the escalating burdens being imposed on all Scottish businesses which are currently inhibiting the start up of new businesses and the operation and growth of existing ones and calls upon the Scottish Executive to reduce these burdens to facilitate the creation of conditions in which the creative economy along with the rest of the Scottish economy can flourish and grow."
